title: *POND BUILD* for Florida Alligator Farm (Rec Pond Revealed)

tasks.task: Preparing and constructing an ecosystem pond at an alligator farm in St. Augustine, Florida.
subtasks: Digging the pond according to the marked boundaries.
Installing a filter system (using a swimming pool filter and underlayment).
Laying EPDM liner and attaching the skimmer.
Setting driftwood elements and creating shallow pools for birds.
Equipping the pond with waterfalls, pipes, and bio-falls.
Ensuring the ecosystem is suitable for birds and feeding alligators.

tasks.task: Building a Southwestern Arroyo and waterfalls.
subtasks: Laying a base for the Arroyo.
Placing large logs and rocks for aesthetic and structural support.
Creating waterfalls and integrating steps for accessibility.
Incorporating a bio-fall wetland filter behind the Arroyo.
Constructing retaining walls and edges for the pond.
Installing lighting, plants, and features for interactivity.
Preparing for the patio and brick structure.
Planting native Southwestern vegetation and incorporating carnivorous plants.
Installing steps and walkways around the pond.
Grading the surrounding area for optimal drainage and aesthetics.
